channel.title: Need help changing stuff for MegaScape server
channel.description:
Hello evrybody , i am running an Private server with MEGAscape Source... Now many people visit evry day , and i would like to change all the text in the menys.. Ive tried to do this , but it all end up the same way , nothing changes. Can somebody please help me Change som stuff. I will ofcourse keep who really made the stuff and so be there.. But i wanna change soem things , since ppl think i aint Owner and admin , thats not funny.
Thanks.

item.title: Need help changing stuff for MegaScape server
item.dc:creator: @nuxeem nuxeem
item.description:
@nuxeem wrote:

[quote=“xmelix136, post:4, topic:44348”]me i know
pick some bone in killing guard .depose it at bank. log out.go in character.click ont ur character.in the page of ur character u have some number in BANK ex: 417 1
u go in all id u go in item chose u chose an item and u pick the number of the after item and u go to ur character page u change the 417 in the ex and the number of exemplar its the 1 u change it for 100000.ta!ta!u have item[/quote]
Are you kidding me…?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help changing stuff for MegaScape server
